title: Regional GAM
questions: What are abundance and trends of a butterfly species?
objectives: Compute and visualize phenology of a species through the years
key_points: We sequentially computed phenology, abundance index, trend and model this trend
We learned how to interpret a trend using modeling and data visualization
This tool compute phenology in order to predict missing data, no definitive conclusion can be made on the phenology using this tool
